bibl.title: Fragmenta Alexandrina I. Some Inscriptions from the Roman Baths at Kom el Dikka.
bibl.note: Preliminary publication of 5 fragments. Nos 1-2 and 4-5 are Greek. The dimensions of the letters TA of No. 3 point to a monumental inscription (name of an emperor?).
bibl.seg: LUKASZEWICZ Adam, Fragmenta Alexandrina I. Some Inscriptions from the Roman Baths at Kom el Dikka.
ZPE 82 (1990) pp. 133-136, 1 plan et pll. II-III.
